Stab.Expression: Console.WriteLine('Enemy performs a swift stab.'); target.ReceiveAttack(5);

BloodySlice.Expression: Console.WriteLine('Enemy executes a bloody slice, causing severe damage.'); target.ReceiveAttack(10);

Backstab.Expression: Console.WriteLine('Enemy sneaks behind for a lethal backstab.'); target.ReceiveAttack(15);

Taunt.Expression: Console.WriteLine('Enemy uses a taunt, drawing attention without dealing damage.'); target.ReceiveAttack(0);

Fireball.Expression: Console.WriteLine('A massive fireball scorches through the air towards the target.'); target.ReceiveAttack(20);

HealingChant.Expression: Console.WriteLine('Enemy performs a healing chant, restoring vitality.'); target.ReceiveAttack(-10);

ThunderStrike.EXISTENCE: Console.WriteLine('The sky darkens as a thunderous strike targets the enemy.'); target.ReceiveAttack(25);

VenomousBite.Expression: Console.WriteLine('Enemy delivers a venomous bite, injecting deadly toxins.'); target.ReceiveAttack(12);

MysticalBind.Expression: Console.WriteLine('Mystical energies bind the target, rendering them immobile.'); target.ReceiveAttack(0);
